roleset.name: a hinderance to a goal, productivity

role.descr: goal, target that arg0 is counterproductive to

example.name: All args
example.text: Recreational drugs are a waste because it *EXP* is counter productive to nature , to society , and to your personal growth to have access to undeserved bliss .
example.arg: to nature , to society , and to your personal growth
to have access to undeserved bliss .

roleset.note: COUNTERPRODUCTIVE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from counterproductive.01-j)
